sbp.client.watchdog module¶

The sbp.client.watchdog module contains watchdog alarm functionality.

class sbp.client.watchdog.Watchdog(timeout, alarm)[source]¶

Watchdog wraps a timer with a callback that can rearm the timer.

timeout : float
timeout of timer in seconds
alarm : callback
function to call when/if timer expires
call()[source]¶

Rearm the timer.
